name: Christian D'Albano
title: Software Developer
summary: Passionate creative developer with strong expertise in modern JavaScript frameworks and a proven track record of building performant, beautiful, usable and scalable web applications. Experienced in delivering pixel-perfect UI/UX designs, optimizing performance, and working with cross-functional teams to bring product ideas to life. Proficient in React, TypeScript, Vue.js, and integrating front-end interfaces with complex back-end systems. Passionate about building user-friendly interfaces and driving code quality through best practices.

technical_proficiency.frontend_development: React, TypeScript, Vue.js, HTML5, JavaScript (ES6+), CSS3, Tailwind CSS, SASS, Webpack, Vite, Figma, styled-components
technical_proficiency.backend_development: Node.js, Java, Spring Boot, RESTful APIs, GraphQL
technical_proficiency.cloud_technologies: Microsoft Azure, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines
technical_proficiency.tools_platforms: Git, GitHub, Jenkins, Figma, Adobe XD, Jira, Webpack, Gulp, Grunt

responsibilities: Develop and maintain front-end automation scripts using React and TypeScript to enhance troubleshooting and streamline the support process for web applications.
Collaborate with back-end teams to integrate API-based services, ensuring efficient communication between front-end systems and back-end services.
Work closely with front-end teams to debug and optimize Vue.js and React-based interfaces, improving performance and UX across various projects.
Build and optimize custom user interfaces, driving a 40% improvement in performance and reducing manual support workload through automation.
experience.technologies: React, TypeScript, Vue.js, REST APIs, Git, Webpack, Java

responsibilities: Developed responsive and user-friendly interfaces for a large-scale patient portal using React and TypeScript, improving user experience and reducing response times by 20%.
Integrated front-end components with Java-based back-end microservices to ensure seamless API consumption and data exchange.
Collaborated closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI/UX designs using Figma and styled-components.
experience.technologies: React, TypeScript, Java, Azure, PostgreSQL, RESTful APIs, Figma

responsibilities: Designed and implemented a scalable Vue.js front-end for a custom eCommerce platform, optimizing performance for real-time updates and high traffic.
Collaborated with back-end developers to integrate Vue.js front-end components with Node.js microservices, ensuring smooth API consumption.
Led the integration of Figma designs into a fully responsive front-end experience using TypeScript, increasing customer engagement by 50%.

responsibilities: Developed front-end features using Vue.js and TypeScript, focusing on responsive design and performance optimization.
Collaborated with back-end teams to integrate Vue.js components with Java-based microservices, contributing to a scalable eCommerce platform.
Worked closely with UI/UX designers to implement Figma-based designs into the Vue.js front-end, following best practices in responsive and performant web design.
